lines.text: Well, that's the end of him. You people want in on a little secret? You wanna know how I tricked that guy all through the picture?

[Both of them]
We was twins all the time! Ha ha ha ha!
[Two Meatheads appear, each taking a hold of one of the Screwys]

[Both of them]
So was we. Ha ha ha ha!
My cartoon would have been cuter.
Nope, n-nothing but birds, I'm a bird dog, registered, p-pedigreed b-bird dog, I chase nothing but birds, that's all, just birds.
Aw, you're probably too slow to chase squirrels. You're yellow. Why you... Oh, pardon me.
[Closes phone booth door so that audience cannot hear; blows raspberry through phone; Meathead arrives instantly]
I knew that'd get him. Ha ha ha ha!
Now, let's see, what's the next thing I do to that guy? What is that next scene?
[Lifts corner of screen to peek at next scene]
